member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.PDFDestinationZoomMode
member.summary: Specifies the available zoom modes that can be applied when the PDF page specified in the destination is displayed.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.PDFDestinationZoomMode.XYZ
member.summary: Display the destination page at the specified position and zoom.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.PDFDestinationZoomMode.Fit
member.summary: Display the destination page, with its contents magnified just enough to fit the entire page within the window both horizontally and vertically.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.PDFDestinationZoomMode.FitH
member.summary: Display the destination page at the specified top position and the contents of the page magnified just enough to fit the entire width of the page within the window.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.PDFDestinationZoomMode.FitV
member.summary: Display the destination page at the specified left position and the contents of the page magnified just enough to fit the entire height of the page within the window.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.PDFDestinationZoomMode.FitR
member.summary: Display the destination page, with its contents magnified just enough to fit the rectangle specified by the coordinates left, bottom, right, and top entirely within the window both horizontally and vertically.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.PDFDestinationZoomMode.FitB
member.summary: Display the destination page, with its contents magnified just enough to fit its bounding box entirely within the window both horizontally and vertically.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.PDFDestinationZoomMode.FitBH
member.summary: Display the destination page at the specified top position and the contents of the page magnified just enough to fit the entire width of its bounding box within the window.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.PDFDestinationZoomMode.FitBV
member.summary: Display the destination page at the specified left position and the contents of the page magnified just enough to fit the entire height of its bounding box within the window.

member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Annotations.PDFAnnotationFlags
member.summary: Specifies the available flags for an annotation.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Annotations.PDFAnnotationFlags.Invisible
member.summary: If set, do not display the annotation if it does not belong to one of the standard annotation types.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Annotations.PDFAnnotationFlags.Hidden
member.summary: If set, do not display or print the annotation or allow it to interact with the user.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Annotations.PDFAnnotationFlags.Print
member.summary: If set, print the annotation when the page is printed. If clear, never print the annotation, regardless of whether it is displayed on the screen.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Annotations.PDFAnnotationFlags.NoZoom
member.summary: If set, do not scale the annotation's appearance to match the magnification of the page.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Annotations.PDFAnnotationFlags.NoRotate
member.summary: If set, do not rotate the annotation's appearance to match the rotation of the page.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Annotations.PDFAnnotationFlags.NoView
member.summary: If set, do not display the annotation on the screen or allow it to interact with the user. The annotation may be printed (depending on the Print flag), but should be considered hidden for the purposes of onscreen display and user interaction.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Annotations.PDFAnnotationFlags.ReadOnly
member.summary: If set, do not allow the annotation to interact with the user.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Annotations.PDFAnnotationFlags.Locked
member.summary: If set, do not allow the annotation to be deleted or its properties (including position and size) to be modified by the user. However, this flag does not restrict changes to the annotation’s contents, such as the value of a form field.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Annotations.PDFAnnotationFlags.ToggleNoView
member.summary: If set, invert the interpretation of the NoView flag for certain events.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Annotations.PDFAnnotationFlags.LockedContents
member.summary: If set, do not allow the contents of the annotation to be modified by the user. This flag does not restrict deletion of the annotation or changes to other annotation properties, such as position and size.

member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Graphics.PDFBlendMode
member.summary: Specifies the available blend modes.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Graphics.PDFBlendMode.None
member.summary: Same as Normal, but for internal library use.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Graphics.PDFBlendMode.Normal
member.summary: Selects the source color.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Graphics.PDFBlendMode.Multiply
member.summary: Multiplies the backdrop and source color.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Graphics.PDFBlendMode.Screen
member.summary: Multiplies the complements of backdrop and source color values, and then complements the result.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Graphics.PDFBlendMode.Overlay
member.summary: Multiplies or screens the colors depending on the backdrop color.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Graphics.PDFBlendMode.Darken
member.summary: Selects the darker of the backdrop and source colors.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Graphics.PDFBlendMode.Lighten
member.summary: Selects the lighter of the backdrop and source colors.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Graphics.PDFBlendMode.ColorDodge
member.summary: Brightens the backdrop color to reflect the source color.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Graphics.PDFBlendMode.ColorBurn
member.summary: Darkens the backdrop color to reflect the source color.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Graphics.PDFBlendMode.HardLight
member.summary: Multiplies or screens the colors depending on the source color.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Graphics.PDFBlendMode.SoftLight
member.summary: Darkens or lightens the colors depending on the source color.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Graphics.PDFBlendMode.Difference
member.summary: Subtracts the darker of the two constituents colors from the lighter.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Graphics.PDFBlendMode.Exclusion
member.summary: Same as Difference, but lower in contrast.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Graphics.PDFBlendMode.Hue
member.summary: Creates a color with the hue of the source color and the saturation and luminance of the backdrop color.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Graphics.PDFBlendMode.Saturation
member.summary: Creates a color with the saturation of the source color and the hue and luminance of the backdrop color.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Graphics.PDFBlendMode.Color
member.summary: Creates a color with the saturation and hue of the source color and the luminance of the backdrop color.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Graphics.PDFBlendMode.Luminosity
member.summary: Creates a color with the luminance of the source color and the saturation and hue of the backdrop color.

member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Graphics.PDFHatchType
member.summary: Specifies the available style for hatched fills.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Graphics.PDFHatchType.None
member.summary: No hatched fill.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Graphics.PDFHatchType.BackwardDiagonal
member.summary: A pattern of lines on a diagonal from upper right to lower left.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Graphics.PDFHatchType.ForwardDiagonal
member.summary: A pattern of lines on a diagonal from upper left to lower right.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Graphics.PDFHatchType.Cross
member.summary: Specifies horizontal and vertical lines that cross.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Graphics.PDFHatchType.DiagonalCross
member.summary: Specifies forward diagonal and backward diagonal lines that cross

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Graphics.PDFHatchType.Horizontal
member.summary: A pattern of horizontal lines.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Graphics.PDFHatchType.Vertical
member.summary: A pattern of vertical lines.

member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Graphics.PDFXAxisDirection
member.summary: Specifies the available directions for the X axis of the page canvas.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Graphics.PDFXAxisDirection.LeftToRight
member.summary: The X axis is oriented from left to right. The values on X axis grow from left to right. This is the default direction used by PDF4NET library.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Graphics.PDFXAxisDirection.RightToLeft
member.summary: The X axis is oriented from right to left. The values on X axis grow from right to left.

member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Graphics.PDFYAxisDirection

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Graphics.PDFYAxisDirection.TopToBottom

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Graphics.PDFYAxisDirection.BottomToTop
member.summary: The Y axis is oriented from bottom to top. The values on Y axis grow from bottom to top.

member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Printing.PageScaling
member.summary: Specifies the available scaling options when printing a PDF file.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Printing.PageScaling.None
member.summary: No page scaling is performed. The page content is displayed starting from the top left corner of the page. Content that falls outside the printable are is not printed.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Printing.PageScaling.FitToPrinterMargins
member.summary: Page content is scaled, enlarged or reduced, to fit the printable area. The original aspect ratio is not preserved.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Printing.PageScaling.FitToPrinterMarginsProportional
member.summary: Page content is scaled, enlarged or reduced, to fit the printable area. The original aspect ratio is preserved.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Printing.PageScaling.ReduceToPrinterMargins
member.summary: Page content is scaled (reduced) to fit the printable area if it is larger than the printable area. If it is smaller, no scaling is performed. The original aspect ratio is not preserved if one of the dimensions, width and/or height, needs to be scaled.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Printing.PageScaling.ReduceToPrinterMarginsProportional
member.summary: Page content is scaled (reduced) to fit the printable area if it is larger than the printable area. If it is smaller, no scaling is performed. The original aspect ratio is preserved if one of the dimensions, width and/or height, needs to be scaled.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Printing.PageScaling.MultiplePagesPerSheet
member.summary: Multiple pages are printed on a single sheet of paper.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Printing.PageScaling.MultiplePagesPerSheetProportional
member.summary: Multiple pages are printed on a single sheet of paper. The original aspect ratio is preserved for each page.

member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Printing.PDFPrintContent
member.summary: Specifies what parts of the page (content, annotations and/or form fields) should be printed.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Printing.PDFPrintContent.Page
member.summary: Page content should be printed.

member.summary: Annotations should be printed.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFView4NET.Printing.PDFPrintContent.FormFields
